values.description: Shifting, twisting, pulsing. The painful transformation of [PAWN_nameDef]'s poor face continues. [PAWN_possessive] jaws have elongated into a snout and [PAWN_possessive] front teeth have grown longer.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s face has completely reshaped into one resembling a hare's, with a twitchy pink button nose and long buck teeth. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
